content.text:
# ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology

ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology is a quarterly peer-reviewed scientific journal covering software engineering published by the Association for Computing Machinery since 1992. The editor-in-chief is Abhik Roychoudhury (National University of Singapore). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2024 impact factor of 6.2.
